snippet: Eight Los Angeles police officers who mistakenly shot up a pickup truck, injuring two women, during a manhunt last year will be allowed to return to the field after additional training
abstract: Eight Los Angeles police officers who mistakenly shot up a pickup truck, injuring two women, during a 2013 manhunt will be allowed to return to the field after additional training.
lead_paragraph: Eight Los Angeles police officers who mistakenly shot up a pickup truck, injuring two women, during a manhunt last year will be allowed to return to the field after additional training

headline.main: California: Officers in Shooting Can Return to Duty
headline.print_headline: California: Officers in Shooting Can Return to Duty
